ModMetaData.name: Better Transhumanists
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru (James B)
ModMetaData.description: Increases the number of transhumanist (body modder) trait levels from 6 to 14. New max transhumanist mood bonus is +30 when using 14 artificial body parts. In vanilla, Machine body complete is the final stage, but why should it be? Only 6 body parts and you're done? No way! Adds 8 new levels to the transhumanist (body modder) trait, each with unique descriptions and an ever-increasing mood bonus.
